title: 84.0911 WILD RICE MANAGEMENT ACCOUNT.
text:
The wild rice management account is established as an account in the game and fish fund.
Money received from the sale of wild rice licenses issued by the commissioner under section 84.091, subdivision 3, paragraph (a), clauses (1), (3), and (4), and subdivision 3, paragraph (b), shall be credited to the wild rice management account.
Except for the electronic licensing system commission established by the commissioner under section 84.027, subdivision 15, money in the wild rice management account is annually appropriated to the commissioner and shall be used for management of designated public waters to improve natural wild rice production.
